pageContext.claim: “We've got to change our way. Merit system -- I want merit system, because you know what's happening? All these companies are coming into our country -- they're all coming into our country. And, when they come in, we need people that are going to work. I'm telling you, we need workers now. We need workers.”
pageContext.analysis: In calling for an end to "chain migration," Trump ignores the fact that Melania Trump's parents are on the verge of gaining citizenship. They appear to have obtained legal permanent residence because they are the parents of a U.S. citizen, a category that the president seeks to eliminate.
